physical_appearance:This is a white under blouse. The blouse buttons down the front. It has short sleeves and a v-neck. The fabric features a light repeated floral pattern. There are two pockets in the front near the bottom hem. The blouse is slightly crumpled along the folds.
subject_terms_1:folk costume maids (servants) flower (motif)

subject_terms_3:Chinese costumes Lu
 Earl Ming-Teh
subject_terms_4:
sgcool_label_text:This loose-fitting cotton camisole with a woven floral design belonged to a majie
 a Cantonese female domestic helper. It was worn under the samfoo
 their traditional attire which consists of a white mandarin-collar top and black trousers.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This loose-fitting cotton camisole with a woven floral design belonged to a majie, a Cantonese female domestic helper. It was worn under the samfoo, their traditional attire which consists of a white mandarin-collar top and black trousers.
